ace-playbook-documentation.description: ACE system playbook documentation structure with YAML frontmatter and markdown content
patterns: YAML frontmatter with pattern metadata (pattern_id, type, insight_count, updated)
Structured insights documentation with sections (Reflector Analysis, Insight History, Meta-Learning)
Auto-generated documentation footer indicating agent authorship

ace-reflector-system.description: ACE Reflector agent system for analyzing pattern usage and generating insights
patterns: Pattern type 'reflector_insights' for tracking agent-generated analysis
Timestamped updates for tracking pattern evolution
Placeholder text for empty insights pending agent analysis

ace-offline-training.description: ACE offline training mode for pattern analysis and learning
patterns: Pattern ID format 'ace-offline-training-00004' indicating training sequence
Training mode flag in request structure

meta-learning-architecture.description: Self-improving system that learns from pattern usage to enhance pattern definitions

structured-documentation-generation.description: Machine-generated documentation following consistent templates with human readability

evolutionary-documentation.description: Living documentation that evolves based on actual usage and agent analysis

temporal-tracking.description: Timestamp-based tracking of pattern evolution and insight accumulation

evidence-based-learning.description: Learning and insights derived from actual codebase usage rather than theoretical assumptions

machine-generated-with-human-readability.description: Automated content generation while maintaining clear structure and readability for human developers

confidence-based-learning.description: Tracking pattern maturity through observation counts and timestamped evolution

separation-of-concerns.description: Clear separation between pattern definition, usage tracking, and insight generation

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths, YAML frontmatter, and markdown structure
